MetaboCoreUtils 0.0.2

Calculate mass-to-charge ratio

Source: R/adducts.R
mass2mz.Rd

mass2mz calculates the m/z value from a neutral mass and an adduct definition.

mass2mz(x, adduct = "[M+H]+")

Arguments

x

numeric neutral mass for which the adduct m/z shall be calculated.
adduct

character specifying the name of the adduct; supported values are returned by adductNames()

Value

numeric representing the calculated m/z value.

See also

mz2mass() for the reverse calculation, adductNames() for supported adduct definitions.

Author

Michael Witting, Johannes Rainer

Examples


exact_mass <- 100
adduct <- "[M+H]+"

## Calculate m/z of [M+H]+ adduct from neutral mass
mass2mz(exact_mass, adduct)
#>   [M+H]+ 
#> 101.0073 

exact_mass <- 100
adduct <- "[M+Na]+"

## Calculate m/z of [M+Na]+ adduct from neutral mass
mass2mz(exact_mass, adduct)
#>  [M+Na]+ 
#> 122.9892 

## Calculate m/z of multiple adducts from neutral mass
mass2mz(exact_mass, adduct = adductNames())
#>        [M+3H]3+     [M+2H+Na]3+     [M+H+Na2]3+       [M+Na3]3+        [M+2H]2+ 
#>        34.34061        41.66792        48.99524        56.32255        51.00728 
#>     [M+H+NH4]2+       [M+H+K]2+      [M+H+Na]2+  [M+C2H3N+2H]2+       [M+2Na]2+ 
#>        59.52055        69.98522        61.99825        71.52055        72.98922 
#> [M+C4H6N2+2H]2+ [M+C6H9N3+2H]2+          [M+H]+         [M+Li]+      [M+2Li-H]+ 
#>        92.03383       112.54710       101.00728       107.01546       113.02364 
#>        [M+NH4]+      [M+H2O+H]+         [M+Na]+     [M+CH4O+H]+          [M+K]+ 
#>       118.03383       119.01784       122.98922       133.03349       138.96316 
#>    [M+C2H3N+H]+      [M+2Na-H]+    [M+C3H8O+H]+   [M+C2H3N+Na]+       [M+2K-H]+ 
#>       142.03383       144.97116       161.06479       164.01577       176.91904 
#>   [M+C2H6OS+H]+   [M+C4H6N2+H]+         [2M+H]+       [2M+NH4]+        [2M+Na]+ 
#>       179.02122       183.06038       201.00728       218.03383       222.98922 
#>         [2M+K]+   [2M+C2H3N+H]+  [2M+C2H3N+Na]+         [3M+H]+ 
#>       238.96316       242.03383       264.01577       301.00728
